doc.name: PlaySound
doc.description: This actor plays audio from a file or URL when it fires. If the input has value true, then the sound is played. If it has value false, then the sound is stopped. If the input is not connected, or the actor fires with no input, then the sound is played when it fires. It requires the Java Media Framework.
doc.author: Edward Lee
doc.port: The input port, which has type boolean. A true input causes the sound to be played, and false input causes it to be stopped.
doc.property: The file name or URL to read.
The gain (in percent). This has as its value a record of the form {min = m, max = M, current = c}, where min <= c <= max.
Indicator to play to the end before returning from fire(). This is a boolean, and defaults to true.
